trends: There have been no other sightings in Six Mile
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe keep game cameras around our home to capture pictures of the abundant wildlife. We have seen hundreds of pictures of balls of light. In the photos we have seen something that looks like a full moon on nights when their was no moon. The most interesting thing I have seen is a blue rectangle that apears to be above ground, then on the ground. Only to become a circle and return to it's rectangular shape and disappear. I have attached photos. There are five pictues in this event, but I only had room for three on this form. It is something to see when all five are shown as a slide show.
